entry.string: Administration - xarBB
What is it?

xarBB provides basic forum functions provided mainly from Xaraya utility modules (topics are provided by xarBB and reply posts by the comments module, for example). The forum itself is very light weight, but designed to handle large volume postings.
entry.translation: O xarBB contém funções fundamentais de um fórum fornecidas principalmente por módulos utilitários do Xaraya. Por exemplo, a função de tópicos é parte do módulo xarBB, e a função para responder mensagens é parte do módulo comentários (comments). Portanto, o módulo xarBB por si mesmo requer um mínimo de recursos, mas é capaz de suportar um grande volume de mensagens.

entry.string: How to use it?
xarBB allows users to post Topics and reply posts to those topics. There are a number of options available from the administration menu.
Add Forums -- Allows you to add new forums to your system. Each forum has a number of configuration options.
entry.translation: Adicionar Fóruns -- Permite ao administrador adicionar novos fóruns ao sistema. Cada fórum pode ser configurado de forma individual.

entry.string: View Forums -- Allows you to view the forums that you have configured on your system.
entry.translation: Exibir Fóruns -- Permite ao administrador exibir os fóruns configurados no sistema.

entry.string: Modify Configuration -- Allows you to set certain master configuration routines for forums.
entry.translation: Modificar Configuração -- Permite ao administrador configurar certas opções padrões e predeterminadas para fórums.

entry.string: Reorder Forums -- Allows you to reorder your existing forums
You can add additional functionality to xarBB forums as you require it.
Hook BBCode or HTML to allow formatted user input and also the option to supply linebreaks for plain text.
Turn off modify 'stamps' in topics and posts and hook Changelog module to allow enhanced changelog management of posts and topics
If you have imported the extra default User dynamic data such as avatars, msn, irc and so on, to your user roles, then these attributes will automatically be displayed in xarbb topics and posts.
Set priviliges for Comments module and xarBB to allow or disallow viewing, posting of topics and replies, editing of their own posts by users, and setup of moderator groups.
Administrators and moderators have additional functionality including deleting posts, marking posts as announcements or sticky topics, moving posts, and locking topics from further postings.
You can build the functionality you would like into xarBB and use override templates to customize every aspect of the xarBB templates.
Included Blocks

There is currently one block provided called Latest Posts. If the block is not showing as an option when adding a Block instance it may not have been registered. In this case please add the block type through Admin Blocks-Add Block Type
Included Hooks
There is currently a Search hook. If you hook xarBB to the Search module, users will be able to search through topics and posts, and more specifically for topic and post authors.
